|fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |pcb_id = <!-- Baord ID --> |ethoui = <!-- OUI -->
|cpu1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8393M; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 700 <!-- doc? --> |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L25635FMI-10G; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Winbond;W631GG8KB-15; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips -->

|sw_cpu = true |sw2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->

|exp_if_types = SFP |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIExpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = 4 |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.5 |pwr_poe_type = <!-- Type of POE --> |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = C13

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|in|mm}} {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|mm|in}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== === Specification=== *SoC: [[Realtek]] RTL8393M *Flash: Macronix MX25L25635FMI-10G (32MB, SPI NOR) *RAM: Winbond W631GG8KB-15 (128MB, DDR3) *Ethernet : 10/100/1000 Mbps x48 + 2 : port 1-40 : TP, RTL8218B x5 : port 41-48 : RTL8218FB : port 41-44: TP : port 45-48: TP/SFP (Combo) *UART: RS-232 port on the front panel (RJ-45) :Pin: 3:TX, 4:GND, 5:GND, 6:RX (RJ-45) 9600N8 *Power: 100-240 VAC, 50/60 Hz, 0.5 A :Plug: IEC 60320-C13 *Stock OS: VxWorks based *LEDs/Keys: 7x / 1x
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/panasonic/panasonic_switch-m48eg_pn28480k |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = realtek |subtarget = rtl839x |arch = mips_24kc |support_started_version = 23.05.0 |current_supported_version = auto |unsupportedfuncntions = Combo SFP (RTL8218FB) |comment = port 45-48 are TP/SFP (Combo) }} Please insert instructions here
==See also== *[[Panasonic Switch-M8eG (PN28080K)]] • [[Realtek]] RTL8380M/RTL8218B *[[Panasonic Switch-M16eG (PN28160K)]] • [[Realtek]] RTL8382M//RTL8218B *[[Panasonic Switch-M24eG (PN28240K)]] • [[Realtek]] RTL8382M/RTL8218B/RTL8218FB *[[Panasonic Switch-M48eG (PN28480K)]] • [[Realtek]] RTL8393M/RTL8218B/RTL8218FB
